name: CURSED DICE (Yosmi, Yuefeng He)
description:
CURSED DICE is an action roguelike about smashing to roll cursed dice to defeat waves of monsters.

Smash the cursed dice to roll for a cast! 

Curved dark spells on different faces to create your unique cursed dice! 

Protect the cursed forest from the floods of colossal enemies! 

Welcome to CURSED DICE!

Survive:

Try to survive as long as possible with your curse dice.

You will fail if you cannot eliminate all enemies in that wave within 60 seconds. 

Control: 

WASD - Move the character

SPACE - Charge to smash the ground to roll the dice

Left Mouse Button - Select reward after defeating each wave

Cursed Powers: 

Dark Rock - default power that causes small damage to enemies

Skull's Poison - causes range damage to enemies nearby

Thunder Strike - cast lighting on the most potent enemy

Booooomb - causes damage to all enemies

Demon Smile - roll all dices in the arena

(More to be added in the future!  fire, water, ice, magnet, player power-ups, physical damages, and hundreds of others)
